object_name.value: Validate selected Change Request document has only CURRENT version child documents available.

title.value: Validate selected Change Request document has only CURRENT version child documents available.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
Request you to checkout and check in the Change Request document to get the affected tab updated with current version of child documents.

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (select r_object_id from cd_controlled_doc(all) where r_object_id not in(select r_object_id from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id in ($repeatingvalue(affected_doc_object_id))) and r_object_id in ($repeatingvalue(affected_doc_object_id)))
